question: What are the pros and cons for children of warching television?
text: Nowadays, a lot of heirs is watching TV-set. This is very interesting for offspring. Because there are cartoons and everything else on TV- set. Neft, television set shows lots of cartoons , interesting programs and others which primarily broadens scionʼs horizons. Take my little sister for example . There are hours or so my little sister watches TV-SET every day. She learns English and Russian words , differently music and etc.
Turning to the other side of the argument it is very hazardous for their health it leads to many dangerous illnesses such as loss of vision and stress .

Just like ,that some offspring are so addicted and dependent on these devices.In my mind , it is separating from real life.These children may comfort difficultʼs to finding their place in society. Anyway, there is a limit to everything.

All things considered, the benefits of watching TV outweigh the drawbacks. It assists to increase of children outlook. Personally , I believe there are very less profitable side TV-set. So both adults and children should watch TV in moderation.
